Package models

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
models.Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
Represents an appointment in the healthcare system. Stores details such as patient ID, doctor ID, appointment date and time, status, consultation notes, service provided, and prescribed medications.

    • fromString

      public static Appointment fromString(String line)
      Creates an Appointment instance from a CSV string line. Parses the given string to extract appointment details such as appointment ID, patient ID, doctor ID, appointment date and time, status, consultation notes, service provided, prescribed medications, and their quantities.
      Parameters:
      line - The CSV string containing appointment details, where fields are separated by commas. Expected fields include:
      1. Appointment ID
      2. Patient ID
      3. Doctor ID
      4. Appointment Date and Time
      5. Appointment Status
      6. Consultation Notes
      7. Service Provided
      8. Medications (semicolon-separated)
      9. Quantities (semicolon-separated)
      10. Medication Status
      Returns:
      An Appointment object created from the parsed details. Returns null if the input string does not contain the required fields.
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - If the appointment date and time format is invalid.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the appointment status or medication status is invalid.

      public void setMedications(List<Medication> prescribedMedications)
      Sets the list of prescribed medications for the appointment.
      Parameters:

    • setQuantities

      public void setQuantities(List<Integer> prescribedQuantities)
      Sets the list of prescribed quantities corresponding to each medication.
      Parameters:
      prescribedQuantities - A list of integers representing the quantities prescribed for each medication in the same order.

    • getAppointmentById

      public static Appointment getAppointmentById(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID. Uses a caching mechanism to avoid repeated file reads for the same appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found, or null if the appointment with the given ID does not exist.
